verbose_text: Fructose as it is not, stimulates insulin secretion from beta cells; leads to increased caloric intake and obesity [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR], and reduction in added sugar is one means to achieve a reduction in energy density [XREF_BIBR], and significantly alter hepatic insulin sensitivity and lipid metabolism compared with similar amounts of glucose [XREF_BIBR].
